stations.format_notes: Long bone, sling and swath, traction splint. Cardboard/traction/SAM splints required. June 2024 traction splint protocols.

stations.format_notes: Two IV manikin arm stations possible. Manikin arms — not live stick at this stage.

stations.format_notes: Medication draw practice with basic medication math.

templates.review_notes: IV live stick explicitly deferred to Week 6 in Group 13 records — manikin arms used this session. Confirm Week 6 captures the live stick carryover. Class split in half noted.

stations.format_notes: IO skill drill PDF and checklist referenced. Platinum documentation required — minimum 2 attempts.

Two live IV stick stations. Carryover from Week 5 deferral.
BVM to SGA progression. All three SGA devices: LMA, King Airway, iGEL. Platinum minimums: SGA ≥2 attempts each device, BVM ≥2, IO ≥2.

templates.title: Med Math Infusions and Monitor Familiarization
templates.review_notes: Two files uploaded for Week 7 in Group 13 records — Group 12 version vs Group 13 version with nearly identical content. Confirm authoritative file before populating future cohort data.

stations.format_notes: Drip rate practice with packet and board review. Equipment: 10, 12/15, and 60-drop tubing.

stations.format_notes: Airway anatomy review with laryngoscopic views. Equipment: SimMom, airway head, King Vision.

templates.title: ETI Introduction and Airway Lab

stations.format_notes: Class split: half with airway instructor, half doing docs and cardiac rhythms. Equipment: 2 airway heads, 1 contaminated head, SimMom, Megacode Kelly, ALS airway torso. ETI Platinum check-off begins — portal tracking starts.
OG/NG tube placement plus ET tube and trach suctioning. Instructors: J. Lomonaco, B. Young.
